entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
